data.title: The Royal Sonesta Washington DC Dupont Circle â€“ Best Rates
data.meta_description: Book Direct for Best Rates. Our Dupont Circle hotel offers delightful amenities including on-site dining, event venues, an outdoor pool, and more.
data.text:
The Royal Sonesta Washington DC Dupont Circle boasts a prime location in the Dupont Circle neighborhood. Stay in the vicinity of The White House, monuments, memorials, and the cityâ€™s most renowned shops and bars.

This elegant boutique hotel features tastefully designed guest rooms and specialty suites. Guests can further enjoy the culinary artistry of Italy at Certo!, the hotelâ€™s onsite restaurant. After a long day of meetings or work, you can unwind in our seasonal outdoor pool or in our state-of-the-art fitness center open 24 hours a day. Explore the Dupont Circle neighborhood with complimentary bikes, or visit our front desk team to book a guided tour or private transportation options.

With more than 10,000 square feet of flexible space, all with natural light, the hotel can also accommodate meetings and events of all kinds.

Take a Tour!

We love your furry friends as much as you doâ€”and now they're welcome to stay FREE at The Royal Sonesta Washington DC Dupont Circle!

Sonesta provides special pet amenities like comfy pet beds, bowls, waterproof mats, and treats at check-in. Weâ€™ll greet your pet with an arrival letter outlining our local recommendations for a "pawsome" stay.

The Royal Sonesta Washington DC Dupont Circle is pet-friendly and welcomes well-mannered pets, with no breed or weight restrictions. Up to two pets are permitted per suite. Pets stay for free at The Royal Sonesta Washington DC Dupont.

Discover our Pets Are Welcome At Sonesta (PAWS) policy.

The Royal Sonesta Washington DC Dupont Circle is proud to offer a discounted rate to Federal, State, Local Government, and U.S. Military employees.

Stay within budget with our government per diem rates and enjoy additional food & beverage credit for on-site dining.

Please note that the rate is subject to availability, not available to groups, and requires a valid Government or Military ID to be shown at check-in.

In-Room Dining

Select your favorite breakfast or dinner menu items directly from Certo!, our in-house restaurant, from the QR code conveniently placed in your guest room. Our team will deliver it to your door to enjoy in the privacy of your room.

In-Room Mini Bar

Enjoy an array of snacks and beverages from the comfort of your guest room for an additional fee.

Standard and Electra Bicycles

Bicycles are available to borrow to take you on your own adventure through the city. Our front desk staff can help to book a time that works for you or bikes are available on a first come, first serve basis.

Private Transportation and Guided Tour Arrangements

Ask about our partnership with USA Guided Tours to take you on a private or group tour, arrange transportation, and more in the DMV. Our friendly front desk staff can connect you. Or visit usaguidedtours.com to book on your own.

Fitness Center

Keeping up with your fitness plan while on the road is easy with Sonesta. Our 24-hour fitness center features the latest cardio and strength training equipment and plenty of natural light.

Swimming Pool

A spacious sundeck and outdoor swimming pool await you on the second floor of our urban oasis. Our pool is open seasonally, weather permitting. Pool hours are 8:00 AM - 8:00 PM.

Business Center

Designed with the needs of business travelers in mind, our 24-hour Business Center makes staying connected easy.

The Royal Market

Stop by the Royal Market at the front desk to pick up all your mini-bar amenities.

At The Royal Sonesta Washington DC Dupont Circle, you'll find the freshest local ingredients, creative menus, and superb service right at your fingertips.

Certo!

Located on the hotelâ€™s main level, Certo! brings flavorful Italian coastal cuisine to the Dupont Circle neighborhood. Enjoy our house-made, handcrafted pasta with fresh ingredients. As part of the beverage menu, we offer a selection of craft cocktails and wines that further enhance your dining experience.

Make A Reservation

Certo! Hours & Menus

Breakfast:

Monday - Friday: 6:30 AM â€“ 10:30 AM

Breakfast Menu

Brunch:

Saturday & Sunday, 7:00 AM â€“ 1:30 PM

Dinner Menu

Happy Hour Menu

The Royal Sonesta Washington DC Dupont Circle is pleased to offer in-room dining options. Whether you're ordering a weekend brunch, a locally-sourced dinner, or a glass of wine to cap off the night, you can enjoy it in the comfort of your spacious guest room.

To place your room service order, please dial '0' on your hotel room phone.

In-Room Dining Available Hours:

Breakfast: Monday through Friday 7am to 10am

Brunch: Saturday and Sunday 7am to 1pm

Dinner: Monday through Sunday 5pm to 9pm

Breakfast Menu

Brunch Menu

Dinner Menu

Sunday - Monday Dinner Menu

Wine Menu

Please note a $6.00 service fee will be added to all in-room dining orders, in addition to an automatic 20% gratuity.

Explore the prestigious Georgetown University through one of its tour options. Choose from a tour of the scenic campus, a visit to its notable buildings, a journey through its historic past, or a tour of its academic facilities, including classrooms, libraries, and research centers. Regardless of your interests, a tour of Georgetown University is a great way to gain a deeper appreciation of this prestigious and historic institution. The Royal Sonesta Washington DC Dupont Circle is 1.8 miles from Georgetown University.

Learn more about all the Washington DC universities near our Dupont Circle hotel.

Explore Venue Instant Book Venue View Our Catering Menu

Our hotel features flexible meeting rooms, all with abundant natural light. Groups can access our spaces conveniently from the main lobby level or second floor of the hotel via three elevators. Our dedicated onsite event team will provide you with superior customer service, scrumptious cuisine from our executive chef, customized audio visuals and so much more. Our staff is with you every step of the way. Book your next event with us and experience top notch service from start to finish. Situated in the lively Dupont Circle neighborhood, our Washington DC hotel puts guests within minutes of major points of interest.

Take a Tour

Hotel Highlights

11,000+ sq. ft. of configurable meeting space

11 meeting rooms

Largest room features 2,268 sq. ft.

Max reception capacity: 220

Contact Us

The Royal Sonesta Washington, DC Dupont Circle is your ideal venue for conferences, corporate meetings and social events. Contact our sales and catering team for more information.

At The Royal Sonesta Washington DC Dupont Circle, we go above and beyond to welcome sports groups of all ages and types. Our Washington, DC location and sports-friendly amenities make us a favorite among sports group travel.

We are proud to uphold our Sports Certified status through the Sonesta International Hotels Corporation family of hotels. This certification means that our hotel has undergone industry-specific training and has demonstrated the ability to successfully accommodate sports groups.

We offer special sports group amenities that focus on creating convenience and value for your team, so you can concentrate on the game.

Breakfast included in rate

Parking included in rate

Complimentary Wi-Fi

Complimentary meeting space (if available on-site)

Contact our Sales office at 202.448.1800 to book a group room block for your team or book your own room here.
